titles.title: Providing special investigative authorities for the Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Reported by the Committee on Rules. H. Rept. 105-139.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 51.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 196 (Roll no. 219).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 194 (Roll no. 220).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/17/1997--Introduced. Provides to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight, with respect to the investigation by the Committee of political fund raising improprieties and possible violations of law, special investigative authorities concerning: (1) the handling of information; (2) depositions and interrogatories; and (3) international authorities.
